changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.48

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed sport channel navigation (UP/DOWN now navigates between match channels)
- Fixed sport focus restoration when exiting fullscreen
- Fixed search focus not returning to selected item on back
- Fixed episodes page focus disappearing when navigating from search
- Fixed TMDB backdrop getting stuck when switching between Film/Series tabs
- Fixed intermittent black preview screen with audio

### Performance
- Optimized episodes page loading (batch database queries instead of N queries)

### Previous (v1.0.47)
- Fixed catchup crash in release build
- Fixed buffer settings for catchup playback
